mlx-textgen.description: Production MLX backend - disk-based KV caching, 10-90x speedup

vllm-mlx-legacy.description: Legacy MLX backend - for reference only, use mlx-textgen instead

lmstudio.description: LMStudio - manual server management, switch models in LMStudio UI

openrouter.description: OpenRouter - 400+ cloud models, 84% cheaper than Claude API

claude.description: Real Anthropic Claude API (requires ANTHROPIC_API_KEY env var)

// BACKEND OPTIONS.mlx-textgen: Production MLX backend - disk-based KV cache, 10-90x speedup (recommended)

// BACKEND OPTIONS.openrouter: Cloud models - access GLM-4.6, Qwen, Claude, GPT-4 via one API
// BACKEND OPTIONS.claude: Official Claude API - full features, highest cost

// ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES.ANTHROPIC_API_KEY: Your Anthropic API key (for claude mode)
